tool.name: ProcessModelData

param.name: out_folder
param.dialogReference: Folder where to generate the working directory and results geodatabase

param.name: mdl_out_fld
param.dialogReference:
.OUT folder for the model to process.

Will ignore the scenarios labeled "AVG_DAY_CURRENT", "MAX_DAY_CURRENT" and "BASE'.

param.name: jct_feature
param.dialogReference: Junctions feature class to combine tabular results to. Recommended to reduce this set to the nodes you are interested in.

tool.summary:
Process model results into a rasterizable format.

Tool will generate, for each scenario, a complete set containing 1 record per timestamp, per node. For the IUS this will be a feature class of 700,000+ points. For easier processing, an average scenario will also be output containing a single, averaged result, for each node.

Unless you are working with a time analysis, the average condition is likely sufficient.
tool.usage: Intended use is to convert the model output for zone of influence
